I was meaning to do this a long time ago since I batchified diagonal, do you have a preference for the API?
Given the overloading of diag, we cannot just act on a 2d matrix to return a 3d item, I see two variants:

  • add a size parameter to diag to specify the size of the target matrix
  • add a new function diagonal_matrix (?).

Best regards

Thomas
